alert.note: Alert for Sevier (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 10:50PM CST until January 12 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...REPLACES FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following county, Sevier. * WHEN...Until 845 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1150 PM EST, local law enforcement reported flooding in the advisory area. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas have already caused minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
